::: contentWrapper
# What is \"Rage\" mode? {#what-is-rage-mode .title}

[](javascript:window.print() "Print this article"){.printArticle
aria-label="Print this Article"}

OVERDRIVE Supertrucks have a unique Rage mode that can be triggered when
the Rage Meter is fully charged. 

------------------------------------------------------------------------

::: sections
## Rage Mode

Keeping your Supertrucks moving at top speed - or any other act of
aggression - will charge up the truck\'s *Rage Meter*. When the meter is
full, Rage mode will be available via the large center button on the
game pad.

Press the button and the Supertruck will accelerate beyond normal top
speed and constantly fire its special weapon until the Rage Meter is
depleted (= 15-20 seconds). The truck will also be invincible!
:::

------------------------------------------------------------------------

::: sections
## [X52 RAGE:]{style="line-height: 1.5;"}

[The truck will use a more powerful Pulse Ram to push cars off the track
or send them spinning]{style="line-height: 1.5;"}

-   -   [It is normal that the other cars will lose control, do a
        wheelie and also come off the track]{style="line-height: 1.5;"}

------------------------------------------------------------------------

## [Freewheel RAGE ]{style="line-height: 1.5;"}

[The truck will use a more powerful Gravity Trap to capture multiple
cars behind itself ]{style="line-height: 1.5;"}

-   -   -   [The other cars will lose control, exhibit a flashing white
            LED and ultimately get disabled]{style="line-height: 1.5;"}
        -   [It is normal that affected cars end up spinning and
            occasionally come off the track]{style="line-height: 1.5;"}

------------------------------------------------------------------------

[ ]{style="line-height: 1.5;"}

[    
  ![](//d33v4339jhl8k0.cloudfront.net/docs/assets/5e3f0b1e2c7d3a7e9ae777f5/images/5e7d775004286364bc975cae/img-25345-1585280699-1690362935.jpg){width="255"
height="143"} 
 ![](//d33v4339jhl8k0.cloudfront.net/docs/assets/5e3f0b1e2c7d3a7e9ae777f5/images/5e7d77502c7d3a7e9ae9e3de/img-25345-1585280699-142574283.jpg){width="249"
height="141"}]{style="line-height: 1.5;"}
:::

------------------------------------------------------------------------

::: sections
## [IMPORTANT: ]{style="line-height: 1.5;"}

[Supercars that are affected by RAGE mode will show unusual
behavior including doing wheelies, spinning, showing a flashing LED and
coming off the track - this is absolutely
normal. ]{style="line-height: 1.5;"}
:::
